Test Description: Testing basic game understanding. Counting the number of dominoes in the player's kingdom.
Rationale: There are 2 dominos in total spread across 5 columns and all within the same row. Therefore the minimum amount of rectangle required enclose all the tiles is of width 5 and height 1.
Question: What is the minimum dimension of the rectangle that can enclose all tiles as they are currently laid out? Output your answer as 'Width: <num>, Height <num>
